sentences.sContent: She was touching the dressing gingerly with both hands.
sentences.sCn: 她用双手小心翼翼地触摸着敷药。

synos.tran: 谨慎的；轻手轻脚的；慎重的

remMethod.val: 切生姜(ginger)的时候要小心(gingerly)， 别让生姜汁溅到眼睛里

trans.tranOther: If you do something gingerly, you do it in a careful manner, usually because you expect it to be dangerous, unpleasant, or painful
